content.description: Start matched on eye level rail move up to your left slightly to make on a decent jug and make a large throw to another good hold, continue up to finish on good holds. safe grass landing
content.location: it can be seen in picture #2 on the right side

content.description: sit start in large cut out, start matched on the rail just to the right of Gift of Life. move up right along the rail until you top out with a very high heel. nice opening moves, easy middle and slightly spicy top out
content.protection: 1 pad and a spotter, if you fall throwing the heel you could land on the boulder behind you
content.location: very similar start as Gift of Life just a bit more to the right

content.description: Sit start matched on right side rail, big move out to lip on the left side of the boulder, right hand to big hole in roof of boulder, move to the right to top out.
when looking at the large in cut of the boulder it is the left side overhanging rail. Sit start matched on the lowest point of the left side rail, use the rail and arete to make it to the top.
content.location: when approaching the marmot boulder it is around back near Spindler, there are to separate smaller boulders with large incuts, this boulder is the one on the left.

content.description: Sit start top out is easy; at the time I remember it feeling like a sandbag to other 5's. The boulder is a beautiful overhang with great edges, movement and green lichen.
content.location: Once you've discovered the Marmot Boulder, Circus Animals is on top via minimal scrabbling toward the Northwest.Â  Directions could use work.
